text: Gjorge Ivanov (, ; born 2 May 1960) is a Macedonian politician. He was President of North Macedonia from 2009 to 2019. In March 2016 Ivanov stated that the European Union had failed the Republic of Macedonia and other Balkan countries in the European migrant crisis. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of North Macedonia
title: Gjorge Ivanov
